title: Ep 440 | Phil and Jase Disagree About Earth & Phil Connects News of Jesus with the Gift of Tongues
description:
Phil explains why he believes the Earth is roughly 7,000 years old, while Al and Jase share a much different opinion on Earth's age. Phil makes a great point about how news of Jesus was rapidly spread across multiple regions with different languages around the same time that the Bible mentions the spiritual gift of tongues. Al discusses the theory of evolution and how it was used to strengthen his faith in the Lord. And Jase describes love and how its attributes are usually perceived by non-believers as signs of weakness, when they are actually incredibly strong and desirable characteristics.
